mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.car_no AS "carNo", a.driver AS "driver", a.driver_phone AS "driverPhone", a.status AS "status", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.travel_order_id AS "travelOrder.id"
LEFT JOIN sys_user b ON b.id = a.user_id
mapper.select:

FROM car a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} and a.user_id = #{id} and a.status = 0

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO car( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, car_no, driver, driver_phone, status, user_id, travel_order_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{carNo}, #{driver}, #{driverPhone}, #{status}, #{user.id}, #{travelOrder.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE car SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, car_no = #{carNo}, driver = #{driver}, driver_phone = #{driverPhone}, status = #{status}, travel_order_id = #{travelOrder.id} WHERE id = #{id}
